name: Captain Nimbus
description:
Welcome to Captain Nimbus, a classic arcade style shoot 'em up for the Pico-8!

Controls:

⬅️➡️⬆️⬇️: Movement ❎: Shoot Bullets

Enemies:

Green: Normal amount of health. Blue: Strong, able to shoot bullets, but also very slow. Red: Has same amount of health as green but is faster. Purple: Same as the Red but if you get next to them they then moves sideways towards your ship.

Credits:

Programming, SFX, Music, Cover Art, Idea: Silicon14 (me) Art: ReeceGames Background: Whiteout Labs
